Class BillDAO

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<Bill>
DataAccess.BillDAO
public class BillDAO extends AbstractDAO<Bill>
Data Access Object for the Bill model. Inherits basic create and read operations formAbstractDAO. Sets the correct table name from the database and disables delete and update operations.
